text: Hey Everyone, so the Chicago HubSpot User Group is doing another dev related HUG tonight in Chicago. Does the dev community (or any dev HS employees) have any information that I could pass along to the ppl running the HUG? I wont be able to attend tonight so I wanted to pass something to them. I know I plan on mentioning the new <#CCQSQ2C6L|crankshaft> initiative but wasnt sure if there was other things I might be missing
You could simply state HubSpotâ€™s vision to become a more dev collaborative CMS, and that if people want their voices heard they should get in the slack channel. idk
